resources.string: koyu.space is free and open-source software. It is licensed under the GNU General Public License Version 3. You can view the license here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html
You\'ll need to restart koyu.space in order to apply these changes
koyu.space contains code and assets from the following open source projects:
koyu.space has a minimum scheduling interval of 5 minutes.

The address or domain of any instance can be entered here, such as koyu.space, blob.cat, cdrom.tokyo, and more! 

If you don't yet have an account, you can enter the name of the instance you'd like to join and create an account there.

An instance is a single place where your account is hosted, but you can easily communicate with and follow folks on other instances as though you were on the same site. 

More info can be found at joinmastodon.org.
